title: Jonah and the Very Big Fish - Arch Books
description: The Book of Jonah teaches children that God loves everyone, never turns away from anyone, and He saves all!First published in 1964, Arch Books captivate children with colorful pictures and creative poems. Each book presents a complete Bible story in a fun-to-read way that children ages 5-9 will understand and remember. Known for their biblical and historical accuracy, Arch Books are accessible, engaging, affordable, and collectible-perfect for assisting teachers and parents as they teach children the Bible and how God works in all aspects of life.Also available in Spanish and Bilingual editions.
author: Sarah Fletcher
